settings.title: Hi there,
settings.name: Jane!
settings.text: Welcome to your report summary. Here, you’ll be able to find your diagnosis and learn about next steps.

settings.text_slider: Your ability to visualize problems from a bird’s eye view is particularly impressive. Like many people with dyslexia, you can conjure an idea in your mind, which you can then transform into a tangible output.

Your ability to visualize problems from a bird’s eye view is particularly impressive. Like many people with dyslexia, you can conjure an idea in your mind, which you can then transform into a tangible output.

Your ability to visualize problems from a bird’s eye view is particularly impressive. Like many people with dyslexia, you can conjure an idea in your mind, which you can then transform into a tangible output.

settings.title: A note from your Care Team
settings.name: Hi Jane,
settings.text: Below you'll see a summary of our findings and recommendations to support your learning in the future. Getting results of any kind can be scary, but we’re here to help you through this journey. Please don't hesitate to reach out with any questions – you're part of the Marker family now. P.S. See a note below from Dr. Connell!
settings.description_person: “Jane is a bright, capable young woman. Though reading has historically been a challenge for her, I’m confident she will be able to master phonics with Orton Gillingham instruction.”

settings.text_block: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a neurodevelopmental disorder characterised by excessive amounts of inattention, hyperactivity, and impulsivity that are pervasive, impairing in multiple contexts, and otherwise age-inappropriate.
settings.accordion_text: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a neurodevelopmental disorder characterised by excessive amounts of inattention, hyperactivity, and impulsivity that are pervasive, impairing in multiple contexts, and otherwise  age-inappropriate.

settings.text_block: Dyslexia is a learning disorder that involves difficulty reading due to problems identifying speech sounds and learning how they relate to letters and words (decoding).
settings.accordion_text: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a neurodevelopmental disorder characterised by excessive amounts of inattention, hyperactivity, and impulsivity that are pervasive, impairing in multiple contexts, and otherwise  age-inappropriate.

settings.text_block: Dyscalculia affects a person's ability to understand number-based information and math. People who have dyscalculia struggle with numbers and math because their brains don't process math-related concepts.
settings.accordion_text: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a neurodevelopmental disorder characterised by excessive amounts of inattention, hyperactivity, and impulsivity that are pervasive, impairing in multiple contexts, and otherwise  age-inappropriate.

settings.title: Checking in
settings.text: Help us, help you! Let us know how you’re feeling after learning about your evaluation results.
